name: Active Listening
rubric: 1 = misses key points; 3 = reflects key facts; 5 = paraphrases intent and feelings.
description: Measures how well the trainee captures and reflects the partner's statements.

name: Clear Ask
rubric: 1 = vague or conflicting ask; 3 = specific but timid; 5 = confident and actionable with rationale.
description: Captures whether the trainee states a concrete request/outcome.
